name: Extract data from invoices using OCR
description:
Automatically Extract Invoice Data from QuickBooks with Koncile OCR

Connect QuickBooks Online to Koncile to automate the extraction of key invoice and PO data from your documents.

Use the QuickBooks API to retrieve supplier invoices in PDF format:
GET https://quickbooks.api.intuit.com/v3/company/{companyId}/invoice/{invoiceId}/pdf

Send the PDF to Koncile OCR using your private API key and a predefined extraction template.

Automatically extract structured fields such as invoice number, PO number, dates, amounts, and vendor details.

Receive clean, structured data — ready for automation, reconciliation, or export (CSV, Excel, API…).
